name: Agri World (DBuckz)
description:
Agri World is a 2D interactive educational game. 

You can explore a farm to learn interesting facts about different sectors that can be found on farms. Play through four distinct mini-games and answer questions about the farming industry in Ireland. Complete all the objectives in the note book and try to further your high scores!

Agri World was developed as a college project in tandem with Agri Aware, an irish educational and charitable trust.
